content: in this legal case in the court of north naples a final ruling has been made regarding the succession of a deceased persons estate the court has determined the properties that make up the estate with a total value of €250975 ownership of these properties has been assigned to the parties involved with one party receiving a 15 share the court has also ordered the payment of a sum of money to the remaining sharer additionally the court has addressed various legal principles granting the plaintiffs occupation indemnity and dissolution of the community inheritance a custodian has been appointed to manage the common property and the judgment has been authorized to be transcribed the court has considered the requests and documentation presented by the parties determining the value of real estate shares due to the heirs and concluding that the inheritance is conveniently divisible the court has also addressed issues regarding nonconformity of property title and nullity of certain acts finally the court has determined the costs of the case and assigned them proportionately to the parties involved
